diastase 
47. In  the reaction  2(C6H10O5)  n + nH2O nC12H22O11 
diastase is functioning as 
A. a dehydrating agent 
B. a reducing agent 
C. an oxidizing agent 
D. a catalyst. 
 
48. 48. which of the following compounds has the 
highest boiling point? 
A. CH3 CH2 CH2 CH2 OH 
B. CH3 CH2  CH2 CHO 
C. CH3  CH2 CH2 CH3 
D. CH3 CH2 OCH2 CH2 
49. Detergents have the general formula 
 
A. R(CH2)NOH 
B. RSO3 Na+ 
C. RCO2 Na+ 
D. RCO2H 
50. What process would coal undergo to give coal gas, 
coal tar, ammoniac liquor and coke? 
A. steam distillation 
B. Destructive distillation 
C. Liquefaction, 
D. Hydrolysis.

375oC. 
D. The solid of the moisture from the 
atmosphere.
